DEFAULT.question: How to cancel my SIP?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: Here's how to: -Click on the 'MY SIPs' button below -Click on the name of the SIP mutual fund -Click on the 'CANCEL SIP' button Done. NOTE: Cancelling an SIP means that its monthly installments will stop. You have to redeem it to get your money back. Here is a GIF to show you how to cancel SIP when you open the Groww website.

DEFAULT.question: How to invest in mutual funds?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: Investing is very simple on Groww 1. Using the button below, go to 'Explore' 2. Search or choose a mutual fund 3. Click on 'One-Time' or 'Monthly SIP' 4. Enter the amount to invest 5. Pay via UPI / Netbanking / NEFT If you are starting a SIP, don't forget to add AutoPay Blog - How to choose a mutual fund

DEFAULT.question: How to start SIP?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Here are the steps:

1. In the search bar above, type the name of mutual fundÂ 
2. Enter the amount to invest.
3. Click on the button 'Monthly SIP'.
4. Finish the payment by clicking on 'Proceed to Pay'.

Don't forget to setup autopay for automatic installments.

DEFAULT.question: How to add AutoPay via Biller?
How to withdraw/redeem money from my investments?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Here's how to redeem from a mutual fund:

1. Go to your Dashboard
2. Find mutual fund you want to redeem from, beside it, there are 3 dots. Click on it
3. Click on on the 'Redeem' button
4. Enter amount to redeem
5. Tap on 'Continue'

The amount will take 3-4 working days to reflect in your bank account

Note: Tax saving ELSS funds have a lock-in of 3 years. Here is a GIF to show how you can do so when you open the Groww app.

DEFAULT.question: How to invest more in existing SIP/fund?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: Here's how: 1. Click on the Dashboard button below. 2. Beside the mutual fund's name, click 'Invest'. 3. Enter the amount and choose 'One-Time'. 4. Complete the payment. Done! Here is a GIF to show you how you can do so when you open the Groww website.

DEFAULT.question: How to change SIP date or amount?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Changing SIP date and amount is not possible on Groww.Â 

Here's what you can do instead:

-To change the SIP date, cancel the existing SIP. Then, start a new SIP with the new date.

-To change the SIP amount, cancel the existing SIP. Then start a new SIP with the new SIP amount. Or, start a new SIP with the extra amount that you want to invest.

DEFAULT.question: How to add money to Groww Balance?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Here's how you can add money to your Groww Balance:

-Tap on the button 'Groww Balance' below
-Tap on the button 'Add Money'. 
-Enter the amount you want to invest and tap 'Add Money'
-Then, complete the payment

The money will show in your Groww Balance.
Here is a GIF to show how you can do so when you open the Groww website.

DEFAULT.question: How to withdraw money from Groww Balance?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Here's how to:

-Tap on the 'GROWW BALANCE' button below
-On the top-right area of the screen, you will see an option to enter the amount
-Enter the amount and press the 'Withdraw' button below that

Done!

Here is a GIF to show how you can do so when you open the Groww app.

DEFAULT.question: How to cancel a mutual fund order?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Mutual Fund orders cannot be cancelled once placed

If you placed a buy order, you can redeem/withdraw the amount after the order is completed. 
If you placed a sell order, you can invest the amount back again. 

Note: Exit load may be applicable.
ELSS funds have lock-in for 3 years.

DEFAULT.question: How can I buy Gold on Groww?
DEFAULT.answer:
You can buy Digital Gold using both the app and the website. Press on the button below and follow the steps. 

You will have to:

1. Enter the amount: You can input your desired purchase amount in rupees or grams of gold.

2. Buy in one-click: Review your order to make quick payment within the 5-minute price window.

Secured and insured: Your gold locker will be updated, where you can view your purchased Digital Gold holdings.
